original_text:
“Though his face is covered with fat
    and his waist bulges with flesh,
korean_text: 그의 얼굴에는 살이 찌고 허리에는 기름이 엉기었고

sentences.original_text: Though his face is covered with fat
sentences.korean_translation: 비록 그의 얼굴은 기름으로 덮여 있지만

sentences.original_text: and his waist bulges with flesh
